name: Apple Knight (itch)
description:
An action platformer that is very early in development. New content will be added regularly. Suggestions and feedback welcome! 

Controls:

  • Keyboard
    • Movement: Arrow Keys or W/A/D
    • Jump: Space or Z
    • Attack: Ctrl or X
    • Throw: Shift or C
  • Xbox Controller
    • Movement: D-Pad
    • Jump: A
    • Attack: X
    • Throw: B

Just one level available at the moment. See if you can find the 2 secret areas. Enjoy!
